title: Emerald Polki Kundan Neckpiece - "Pachala Manikyam Haar"
materials: Faceted Emeralds. Features Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite necklace showcases the timeless beauty of Kundan Polki craftsmanship, a signature of Hyderabadi jewelry. Each uncut diamond is meticulously set in gold using the traditional 'pakki kaam' technique. Alternating with emeralds, the arrangement creates a visually appealing rhythm. The central pendant features a pear-shaped emerald encompassed by Polki diamonds. The design blends traditional South Indian design elements with modern sensibilities.
occasions: Half-Saree Function or Langa Voni Function)

description: This piece represents the pinnacle of Hyderabadi jewelry artistry. The combination of Polki diamonds and emeralds is considered auspicious in South Indian culture. The use of 22K gold ensures lasting value, while the exquisite craftsmanship guarantees a timeless heirloom. The intricate design showcases exceptional skill and attention to detail, making it a truly unique statement piece.
